snippet.title: Crista Caelestis Game Sample - PC/Doujin
snippet.description:
Crista Caelestis was/is a pretty cool game that could be a great Smash Brothers-esque game...but I don't think the game is worked on anymore. It is said that the game is based on Ragnarok Online, which I suppose is a plus to those that are really into RO.

There are six characters with various special attacks that can be performed by pressing button(s) + directional keys. There are ultimate attacks that can be performed if you get beat up a lot WITHOUT being knocked off the screen; you get an aura around you and can unleash a devastating attack. The music is good and the game is fun with various stages. It would be cool if someone picked the game back up and added to it.
